caption.title: A map of the Philippines showing the coloured climatic type (I-IV) according to the Coronas classification [ 5â€“ 7].
caption.p: The darker shaded areas on the map highlight the locations of the 24 basins that were included in this study, while the named points represent the basin outlets. The bar plot in the upper left corner represents the ranked total area of each of the 24 basins, while the graph in the lower left corner shows the period of available measured hydrological data used for model calibration for each basin.
